name: Computer Scientist Training Lab
description:
!!  The web version is always the latest I publish. If you want to play the version completed within the deadline you will have to download the version labeled with “_compo_version”. !!

Help us develop the new generation of self-steering multi-purpose robots.

We really need your data in steering these vehicles to replac- um- I mean- support you.

The 1.1 version only fixes small issues in difficulty scaling and level variety and also displays the amount of levels you have already seen and makes it harder to restart the game when you don't intent to.
